title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST/CLI API, macOS/Linux binaries, and a curated model library (Llama-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that wraps Ollama for chat, embeddings, and tool-calling inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama servers; chat history, model management, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j – Java/JVM client
summary: Unofficial Java client with Kotlin-friendly coroutines; chat, pull, list, and delete models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot – VS Code extension
summary: Bring local Ollama models into VS Code inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-cli – Fancy terminal UI
summary: Terminal dashboard for Ollama with chat REPL, model search, and conversation history.

title: ollama-gui – Cross-platform desktop app
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop wrapper that talks to local Ollama; Windows/macOS/Linux binaries.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-curl – Shell helpers
summary: Collection of POSIX shell functions and examples for driving Ollama via curl.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger – CI module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS micro-starter with built-in Ollama service, Swagger docs, and Docker dev env.

title: ollama-rag – Minimal RAG example
summary: Streamlit demo that ingests PDFs into Chroma and answers questions using Ollama embeddings + Llama-3.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI macOS menu-bar app that wraps the local Ollama API for quick prompts and clipboard actions.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that adds a Llama-3 chat pane and note summarization commands via Ollama.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to declaratively manage Ollama models and users on remote hosts.
